title: The Azure Coast Mansion
description: Perched on the cliffs of the French Riviera, this modern masterpiece offers panoramic views of the Mediterranean. Featuring floor-to-ceiling glass walls, an infinity pool that blends into the horizon, and a private helipad, this estate defines coastal luxury.

title: Beverly Hills Historic Estate
description: A 1920s Spanish Colonial Revival estate fully restored to modern standards. Hidden behind tall hedges for ultimate privacy, it features lush gardens, a guest house, and a theater room.

title: Skyline Penthouse Dubai
description: Occupying the entire 90th floor, this penthouse offers 360-degree views of the Burj Khalifa and the Persian Gulf. Includes private elevator access, a sky lounge, and bespoke gold fittings.

title: Tuscan Vineyard Villa
description: A romantic getaway in the heart of Chianti. This villa comes with its own producing vineyard, wine cellar, and olive grove. Traditional stone architecture meets modern comfort.

title: Aspen Mountain Chalet
description: Ski-in, ski-out luxury chalet located at the base of Ajax Mountain. Features a massive stone fireplace, heated driveway, outdoor hot tub, and private ski locker room.

title: Kyoto Zen Garden Estate
description: A tranquil retreat in the historic district of Kyoto. Traditional Japanese architecture with tatami rooms, sliding shoji doors, and a meticulously maintained award-winning Zen garden.

title: Manhattan Modern Townhouse
description: A 5-story limestone townhouse in the Upper East Side. Features a private elevator, rooftop terrace with Central Park views, and a chef's kitchen with Wolf appliances.

title: Bali Rainforest Sanctuary
description: Surrounded by lush jungle in Ubud, this bamboo eco-villa features open-air living spaces, a natural spring pool, and total seclusion. Perfect for wellness retreats.

title: London Kensington Penthouse
description: An ultra-modern penthouse overlooking Kensington Gardens. Sleek lines, minimalist design, and direct lift access make this a prime London residence.

title: Cape Town Ocean Villa
description: Located in Camps Bay, this architectural marvel offers unobstructed views of the Atlantic Ocean and the Twelve Apostles mountain range. Stunning sunset views guaranteed.

title: Swiss Alpine Chalet
description: A fairytale wooden chalet in Zermatt with direct views of the Matterhorn. Cozy interiors, sauna, and easy access to world-class skiing.

title: Miami Waterfront Mansion
description: Located on Star Island, this expansive estate features a private dock for your yacht, a tropical pool oasis, and ultra-modern interiors.

title: Parisian Haussmann Apartment
description: Classic French elegance in the 8th Arrondissement. High ceilings, herringbone parquet floors, marble fireplaces, and balconies overlooking the avenue.

title: Santorini Cliffside Villa
description: Iconic white-washed villa in Oia with a private plunge pool and breathtaking sunset views over the caldera. The ultimate Greek island experience.

title: Texas Ranch Estate
description: A sprawling ranch in Hill Country featuring a main lodge, horse stables, a private lake, and endless acres of rolling land. Rustic luxury at its finest.

title: Vancouver Glass House
description: Nestled in the forests of West Vancouver, this home features floor-to-ceiling glass, blurring the lines between indoor living and the surrounding nature.

title: Sydney Harbor Waterfront
description: Exclusive waterfront property with a private jetty and direct views of the Opera House. Includes a boat house, infinity pool, and expansive entertaining areas.

title: Marrakech Palmeraie Villa
description: A stunning Moroccan palace set within the Palmeraie oasis. Intricate tile work, lush courtyards with fountains, and a hammam spa.

title: Singapore Sky Villa
description: A double-story penthouse in the heart of Orchard Road. Features a private lap pool on the balcony and smart home integration controlling every aspect of the home.

title: Hamptons Beachfront Estate
description: Classic shingle-style home right on the beach in East Hampton. Expansive lawns, a heated gunite pool, and private boardwalk access to the ocean.

title: Lake Como Historic Villa
description: A 19th-century villa directly on the water's edge in Bellagio. Comes with a private boat house, manicured gardens, and frescoed ceilings.

title: Thai Tropical Island Villa
description: Perched on a hillside in Phuket overlooking the Andaman Sea. Open-plan living, infinity pool, and staff quarters. The ultimate tropical hideaway.

title: Barcelona Modernista Apartment
description: Located in Eixample, this apartment features original mosaic floors, stained glass windows, and ornate ceilings. A true piece of Catalan history modernized.

title: Scottish Highland Castle
description: A 16th-century castle set on 500 acres of Highlands terrain. Includes fishing rights on the river, a great hall, and 12 bedrooms. A rare opportunity to own history.

title: Tokyo Minato Luxury Apartment
description: High-end apartment in Roppongi Hills with views of Tokyo Tower. minimalist Japanese design mixed with western luxury standards.
